name: Catrine
description:
Catrine is a 3D single-player puzzle adventure game.

You play as a cat with magical sand bending powers trapped in an enchanted egyptian-themed litter box for behaving nasty. To progress through the level, you have to make use of your sand attraction and blowing powers obtained by consuming catnip, activate buttons, and make your way to the portal.

Will you be able to escape your enchanted prison?

This game was realized at ETHZ during the game lab 2022 by the hyrule #4 group: Gilles, Amro, Attila, Quentin, Zheyu & Yitian.
